title: Teenager arrested after shooting 15-year-old in leg in Fort Smith
content:
FORT SMITH, Ark. —
A 17-year-old boy was arrested Friday afternoon after shooting a 15-year-old boy in the leg, according to Sgt. Daniel Grubbs with the Fort Smith Police Department.
The 15-year-old was hanging out behind a home on N. 36th Street, a couple blocks north of Tilles Park. Some other teenagers came up to the scene, Sgt. Grubbs said.
The 17-year-old shot the 15-year-old in the leg and took off.
The suspect was found in a field and arrested. Police are searching for the gun.
The 15-year-old was brought to a hospital. His injuries are not believed to be life-threatening.
